name: Intergalactic (itch)
description:
Press the "arrow keys" to move and "Space" to shoot.

Enjoy this fun mini game. Play as "rodo raider", destroy the incoming asteroids and avoid the "deadly star". Clearly a parody of two famous sci-fi franchises, please comment what you think about parody in games.

Artist: Ilegot

Title: Retrowave

http://www.hooksounds.com.
